name: Recursion (YagamiKyo)
description:
Help the robot escape from its captivity!

In this game, you take control of a group of robots and solve puzzles to reach the end. Each robot is randomized, and the environment changes depending on which robot you control!

You might want to play the game twice

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam #20. Its main theme is 'Every end is a new beginning'.
